com.aevi.mail

Class MailMessageAttachment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.mail.MailMessageAttachment

  • public class MailMessageAttachment
extends java.lang.Object
    The MailMessageAttachment class contains the information necessary for including an attachment in a MailMessage

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MailMessageAttachment(java.lang.String fileName, byte[] content, java.lang.String contentType)
      Construct a new MailMessageAttachment with the desired filename, content and content type.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getContent()
      Returns the content of the attachment
      java.lang.String getContentType()
      Returns the content type of the attachment, the content type is described as an internet media type
      java.lang.String getFileName()
      Returns the filename of the attachment

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MailMessageAttachment

        public MailMessageAttachment(java.lang.String fileName,
                     byte[] content,
                     java.lang.String contentType)
        Construct a new MailMessageAttachment with the desired filename, content and content type. The content type should be specified as a valid internet media type
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the attachment
        content - the content of the attachment
        contentType - the content type of the attachment
